website_summaries.verdict: London Fog's sleek vest includes a standing collar for extra coverage.
pros: The vest is longer than most, which is good news for tall women
It washes easily and has exceptionally deep pockets
The gold sparkly zipper is an eye-catching touch
cons: The zipper tends to get caught

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The vest is long compared to other vests that I have, in addition the collar is very high when zipped up, it hits my chin.This is just fine for a walk on the beach or hiking or biking. These features lend to a great wind breaker. The vest is cut nicely so it gives it a fem look. I am 5''2' and an average size 10-12 and the medium gives room for a sweater underneath. Comes with a packable bag. Less one star for the gold finish. I did order it because I wanted a versatile vests with gold tone zippers. Yet the gold finish too bright rather than a more subtle brass tone.
customer_reviews.author: No. Cal.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but terrible Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a great deal on this vest. I purchased it for under $50, saying I got $100 off. I don't feel that it is necessarily worth $50. It's very comfortable and lightweight, which I love. The zipper is total crap. It's a plastic zipper that is painted on the front to look like metal, which really makes it difficult to zip at times because it gets caught on itself. Super dumb, cheap zipper makes an otherwise pretty lovely vest one that I rarely reach for. The only reason I didn't return it is because I'm lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Accountant

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, figure flattering, comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very flattering styling, very warm, just what I need around the house and outside on milder winter days. I thought I might not like it due to how ruched the seams appear in the photo online, but the one I received is smoother, not puckered the way amazon's picture makes it appear, very glad about that. I read reviews saying it runs large and had to return Medium for Large as a result. I could zip the Medium, but it was not as comfortable at the chest or over a sweater.
